description: Rindall is a boutique community of 44 thoughtfully designed 3-4 bedroom townhome in the heart of Port Coquitlam. Offering family-sized layouts with the feel of single-family living, residents enjoy proximity to schools, trails, recreation, and downtown amenities. This home features 4 bedrooms, 2.5 bathrooms, a private yard, balcony, and parking for 4 vehicles, including a side-by-side garage. Interiors include 9' ceilings, a cooling system, and full-size kitchen appliances. Nestled in a quiet, walkable neighborhood, Rindall is built by trusted Woodbridge Homes, with completions starting Fall 2025. Rindall sales gallery is open from 12 - 5 pm, every weekend.
